name: BITCOLOJIX
description: Bitcolojix(BTCIX) is an open blockchain protocol and development toolkit for Web 3.0 applications and decentralized solutions aimed at improving the security, reliability and speed of IT systems. It enables mass adoption of the blockchain by providing anyone to build their applications. It aims to be a global ecosystem that allows anyone to launch or trade any form of asset and control it in a decentralized way using smart contracts and other cutting-edge technologies.
